coreAttributes.authorTag: On the underside of the barrel housing, a small engraving reads "MFD by DSG Forgeworks."
coreAttributes.name: Longslide ICA Silverballer
coreAttributes.description: An extenstively customized AMT 1911 Hardballer, this short recoil gas-operated pistol fires the powerful .45 ACP round from its seven round magazine. The barrel is 20% longer than standard and has been threaded for a suppressor.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unholster)] the Silverballer, [npc.verb(slap)] in a fresh magazine, and [npc.verb(turn)] the safety off.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] out the magazine, and [npc.verb(turn)] the safety on, and [npc.verb(holster)] the Silverballer.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(line)] up [npc2.namePos] in the Silverballer's sights and [npc.verb(squeeze)] the trigger. While the bullet hits its mark, [npc2.namePos] aura protects [npc2.her].

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(line)] up [npc2.namePos] in the Silverballer's sights and [npc.verb(squeeze)] the trigger. The bullet whistles past [npc2.name].
